copy.response_0_0: I like anything that's copper colored!
copy.response_0_1: Y'know, Lost Things with parts that tick and tock, or certain leaves in any autumn meadow, or the shiny wing feathers of Shimmer Jays...
copy.response_0_2: Even old pots and pans that I can shine up with Buff Puffs to make them sparkle like new!
copy.response_1_0: One of my favorite things to eat are poppy puff rolls -- yum!
copy.response_1_1: And no one bakes better poppy puff rolls than Dulcie!
copy.response_2_0: I love to work in Tinker's Nook, but ALL work and no play is no fun at all!
copy.response_2_1: My favorite game is Fairy Tag. I love to play it in the meadows!
copy.response_2_2: I just get all flitty watching everybody zip and loop around!
copy.response_3_0: If I can't fix something, OOOO, I get so mad that I... I...
copy.response_4_0: I'm not a water-talent, but I love to help Sil bounce fish up Soapstone Stream.
copy.response_4_1: It makes her so happy, and the little fishies are just so cute!
copy.response_5_0: I'm not one to brag...no, really, I'm not! But I DO have a pretty big collection of Lost Things...
copy.response_6_0: I am NOT impatient! I mean... that is... I just like things to get done, that's all.
copy.response_6_1: Everybody thinks I'm feeling impatient when I pull on my bangs, but sometimes I do it because I'm just thinking hard.
copy.response_6_2: Other times, um... okay, I guess I can be a little impatient sometimes.
copy.response_7_0: As Bobble and Clank like to say, a tinker's work is never done!
copy.response_7_1: We tinker-talents do everything from fixing pots to inventing gadgets that help everybody get ready for the new season.
copy.response_7_2: I guess you could say that tinker-talents are the inventor-fixer-uppers of Pixie Hollow!
